haircuts.name: Pixie Cut

haircuts.description: A cute and neat haircut for girls age 10 & under.

haircuts.name: Fringe Trim
haircuts.description: A trim for the fringe area. Shampoo, conditioner, and scalp massage not included.

haircuts.name: Elegant Layers
haircuts.description: A layered haircut for anyone over the age of 10 with a customized conditioning treatment.

makeupServices.name: Complimentary Touch-up
makeupServices.description: Complete your service with this quick touch up, or pop in and meet with an available service professional or retail beauty advisor.

makeupServices.description: Put your fresh face forward. This make up application will have you looking your best.

makeupServices.name: Cocktail Makeup
makeupServices.description: A make up application that includes enhanced make up techniques for a more dramatic look.

makeupServices.name: Makeup Lesson
makeupServices.description: This informative and interactive hands-on experience is designed to educate you to achieve the look you've always wanted such as the perfect smoky eye.

browServices.name: Brow Tint
browServices.description: A custom color tint for your brows that lasts 3-4 weeks.

nailServices.name: Cherie Manicure

nailServices.name: Gel Manicure
nailServices.description: All the features of our Cherie manicure, but finish with nontoxic Gel Polish instead.
